key_risks: Financial instability due to project cancellations and legal issues
Regulatory hurdles and potential delays in approvals
High initial costs for SMR deployment
Intense competition from alternative clean energy technologies
controversies: Class-action lawsuit alleging misleading investors about contract fulfillment
Termination of the Utah SMR project raising concerns about project delivery
environmental_issues: Public skepticism due to safety concerns and waste management issues
social_issues: Public resistance to nuclear energy due to historical incidents like Chernobyl and Fukushima
governance_issues: Allegations of misleading investors and concealing financial instability
